40970171.review:
Домик на берегу моря, возле которого можно вечно стоять и смотреть вдаль на голубой горизонт. Чего ещё можно пожелать на старости лет? Кажется, что когда появилась седина, то приключения уже обходят тебя стороной, и жизнь проходит ровно и размеренно. Но даже в таком возрасте всё может измениться из-за неожиданного письма. 

Закрыв дом на замок и взяв любимую клюку, мужчина отправляется в путь. Может, долгая пешеходная прогулка и не сравнится с бурными страстями молодости, но, всё же, будет славным приключением для крепкого старика. Путешествие не выглядит суровым или опасным. Большая часть пути проходит по улочкам небольших приятных городов или полям. А серьёзными препятствиями становятся лишь упрямые овцы да возраст. Несмотря на общую бодрость героя, последний иногда даёт о себе знать: старик присаживается отдохнуть на скамеечки и вспоминает свою молодость. Погружаясь в его воспоминания, мы узнаём историю пожилого мужчины и причину, по которой он так спешно собрался в это путешествие.

Игра предлагает провести старика по нелёгкому пути к цели. Он уже не молод, чтобы высоко прыгать, поэтому игроку предлагается изгибать землю так, чтобы пожилой мужчина мог легко перебираться с одной поверхности на другую. С некоторыми предметами также можно взаимодействовать. Например, можно включить радио или захлопнуть ставни в домиках, от чего сидящая у окна старушка будет очень недовольна.

Приятная акварельная картинка и лёгкая музыка сразу настраивают на медитативный и слегка меланхоличный лад. Игра дарит ощущение летнего вечера, в котором вы сидите на кухне за чашкой чая и слушаете рассказы стариков о былом.

40918322.review:
Old man's journey hinterliess bei mir gemischte Gefühle. Das rund 1.5 Stunden lange Spiel hat mich gepackt mit seiner sanften Erzählweise, der kreativen Spielmechanik inklusive der nicht besonders kniffligen Puzzles und überhaupt der wundervollen Atmosphäre. Unglaublich wie man mit Spieldesign (Wetter, Farben) Emotionen transportieren kann und so die eigentlich schmale Erzählung wunderbar begleiten und untermalen kann. Old man's journey ist wirklich eine wunderbare erzählerische Reise.
Gerade darum gibt es aber auch ein grosses "aber". Denn zu einer erzählerischen Reise gehört das Ende ganz fundamental dazu und da gehört Old mans journey leider in die grosse Reihe von Spielen, die genau dort schlampen. Ja, es gibt ein Ende, allerdings ist es viel zu kurz ausgestaltet und oberflächlich. Es ist frustrierend wie oft Spiele heutzutage einen mit einem kurzen Ende abspeisen und gerade bei einem emotional berührenden Spiel wie hier ist es einfach fatal.
Fazit: Wer emotionale und atmosphärische Spiele mag und auch ohne grosse spielerische Ansprüche klar kommt, für den ist Old Man's Journey durchaus eine Empfehlung, sofern man damit klarkommt, dass das Ende in seiner Kürze der vorangegangenen emotionalen Reise nicht entspricht.

40635475.review:
这个游戏对我来说是10分，各方面都非常喜欢。

流程比较短，大概一个半小时的体验。不过这个时间里卡都会掉齐（grrrrrreat！[spoiler]我还出了一张闪卡[/spoiler]
插画风格的画面非常棒，不管玩到哪里截个图都是一张很棒的插图。色彩、笔触都相当舒适。喜欢这类插画风格的盆友玩这个游戏的时候一定会觉得很开心的。场景中有很多小物件可以进行可爱的互动[spoiler]瀑布旁边三个青蛙是低音炮，很棒的[/spoiler]
解谜难度不大，不影响游戏体验的同时还增加了不少游戏感受。
其实别的也不用说很多，因为不管是感受还是玩法，玩的时候很快就能明白过来。这样的游戏必然每个人都会有自己的体验，而自己的那份感受是最珍贵的，这个游戏便是在流畅平缓的叙事中慢慢展开一个人起伏不定的人生过程。作为玩家，在这个过程里自然而然地产生自己的情绪的体会是最好的。在深夜一个人一口气看完这个叙事应该是个不错的选择。

打个黑条注意剧透，说一下我个人的体会。
[spoiler]说到打动我让我流泪的场景，第一次是火车那里，一开始觉得“啊这不就是个把铁轨拉上来拉下去的玩法嘛”，这个过程设置得比较长，但实际玩的时候丝毫不会让人觉得无趣。在操作过程中，配合着音乐和场景，感觉心情变得越来越柔软，甚至想让这个过程一直持续下去——我愿意做这样支撑保护的上帝之手，不断地，永远地做这件事情。
第二次是主角与妻子吵架后抛下家人去航海探险，在极光下看着妻子的照片的场景。我看了这个场景几秒直接流下眼泪，然后我注意到这个场景里主角也在流泪。就算有理想和抱负，为此要离开不同意这件事的家人，吵过架，但孤身在外的时候，在很多个夜晚，都会这样思念起家人。但是这时候要问如果能重新选择，是要离开家人追求梦想还是留在家人身边，说不定答案还是不会改变。只要我们做出选择，就会产生遗憾。我可能也会像这样度过一生，我到时候也会回忆起各种事情。对于这个必然到达的终点依然充满困惑。
第三次是最后主角的妻子去世，他的女儿拿出帆船模型的场景。在关于家庭的主题中，生命的延续和生活的继续总是被提到。新的生命也会有这样的人生进程，而我们还能看到更多故事。[/spoiler]

要是我也能活到年纪很大的时候，我就揣一个折叠板凳，别的什么都不带，出去到处溜达……

40497459.review:
Ein recht einfaches Rätselspiel das für 100 Minuten Rätselspaß reicht.

Erzählt wird die Geschichte eines Mannes der sich auf ein Reise begibt und der Spieler "ebnet" ihm dem Weg. Durch verschieben der Wege und Berge auf verschiedenen Ebenen ermöglicht man dem Mann voran zu kommen und so in 12 Bildern über 12 Level seine Geschichte zu erzählen.

Hierbei werden neue Rätselelemente so geschickt hinzugefügt dass es nicht langweilig wird und immer wieder was neues hinzu kommt.

Es ist spielerisch keine große Herausforderung, aber wer ein wenig entspannen und rätseln will wird mit anderthalb Stunden schöner Grafik und ruhiger Spielweise belohnt.

Das Spiel stammt aber offensichtlich aus dem Mobile Game Sektor und wäre vielleicht eine Überlegung wert es sich für das Smartphone oder Tablet anzuschaffen, zumal, wenn es nicht gerade im Sale ist, sogar fürs Smartphone günstiger ist.

40454156.review:
Old Man's Journey ist ein Spiel, dass ohne Sprache auskommt, aber trotzdem viel aussagt.
Die Grafik ist im Stil von Bildern, die mit Wassermalfarben und Kreide gemalt wurden.

Der alte Mann wird durch die Geschichte bewegt, indem man witzigerweise die verschiedenen Ebenen des Bildes so positioniert, dass er von einer auf die andere wechseln kann.

Es war ein kurzweiliges Spiel, dass mir aber Spaß gemacht hat. Empfehlen kann ich es definitiv, wenn mal wieder im Sale ist un man nur ein paar Euros bezahlen muss.

40172780.review:
It's such a beautiful game. I honestly thought I would like it and have been hoped that there's more to it. 
Major spoiler: there's not.

This game has an amazing art (entirely, every piece of it), but all you would do is leading the way for an old man by pointing once in a while, change hills form when needed (there's a couple things they add a bit later to be on the way that doesn't make a significant difference and fresh up a gameplay for, well, first couple of minutes after). 
It's all you can interract with in the whole game and It gets boring pretty fast. 
There's no other mechanics at all. 
Also, you can't affect the story anyhow, it's completely linear. Storytelling is pretty sentimental and being told through just a few static art pieces that appear when you end the level, it's drawn great but plot is utterly predictable.

I believe if it was more interractive I had all the chances to love it. But I sat and felt the time flowing. Time that could have been spent better.

40163709.review:
Если хочется погрузиться в неторопливый трипп, нарисованный настоящим мастером красок и озвученный со всепоглощающей ностальгией, харАктерной, меняющейся по ходу повестования - это именно то, что тебе нужно.

Путешествие старика... пройти вместе нелегкий путь, через всю эту удивительную механику окружающего ландшафта, проплывая мимо островов памяти, складывая кусок за куском весь пазл его прошлого, понимая суть настоящего... правда ведь отличная задумка, заставляющая замедлить бег жизни и представить себе, может быть, свое будущее, а может, вспомнить и прошлое.

Игра действительно получилась философская и смысл не в том ведь, что каждый из нас порой итак задумывается обо всем этом, а в том, чтобы не соскользнуть с сострия момента и углубиться в него, сказать себе "да, об этом я думаю сейчас, это я могу прочувствовать от начала и до конца". Без суеты. В этом смысл настоящего искусства и эта игра по-настоящему достойна этого звания.

39474471.review:
Recommended, but with mixed feelings. This Old Man's Journey is a beautiful visual novel, with interesting and unique problem solving. However, for me, it always felt like it could be a little better than it was. The story didn't feel as impactful as it could have, but is a nice attempt at looking back over a life lived, the good and the bad. 

It feels more like a game design demo, or an art project, rather than a fully fleshes out game.

I'm glad I played this, and recommend it for that reason, but I'm left hoping someone takes the ideas from this game and create something even better.

Edit: 93 minutes to complete. The extra playtime was from leaving the game running to get the trading cards.

39420788.review:
Ich war neugierig auf was anderes, also habe ich ein paar Rieviews gelesen und die Menschen waren ja begeistert.
Der Preis ist OK, schließlich ist Kino teurer. 
Der Spielumpfang soll so 2 Stunden sein, naja was solls, Kino ist teurer.

Die ersten 10 Minuten waren ernüchternd, die Rätsel verdienen den Namen nicht.
Alles lässt sich mit einer Maustaste steuern, kompliziert und komplex ist anders.
Der alte Mann sagt nichts, er bewegt sich nur von links nach rechts und umgekehrt.

Nun sitze ich total gelangweilt am PC und frage mich, wann war ich zuletzt auf Reisen und weswegen?
Was habe ich gesehen?
Was habe ich erlebt?
Dem "Alten" gehts da genau so, er erinnert sich. 
Die ersten Bilder klicke ich noch weg. Kenne ich schon, nichts neues. 
Die Musik ist melanchonisch und ich löse die Rätsel, welche den Namen nicht verdienen.

Aber das Spiel will mir keine Aufgaben stellen, es gibt keine großen Hindernisse. 
Ich muss nur sehen und begreifen, was der alte Mann sieht 
und wieder verbinde ich Gesehenes mit Erlebtem. 

Das Spiel hat mich gefangen.

Großes Kino! <3

39089453.review:
[h1]한 늙은이의 여행[/h1]

이 게임은 Broken Rules가 2017년 5월에 출시한 한 할아버지의 여행을 담은 퍼즐게임이다.

이 게임은 원근법을 활용하여 지형을 조정하는 독특한 방식의 퍼즐을 가지고 있다.
퍼즐의 경우 난이도는 그리 어렵지 않았으며 정말 참신하다는 느낌이 들었다.
스토리는 플레이어에게 잔잔한 감동을 줄 수 있는 따뜻한 이야기이다.
게임을 진행하는 동안 대사도 없고 지문이나 해설도 없는데 연출이 좋아 대사나 지문이 없어도 내용을 이해하기 쉬웠다.
동화책에서나 볼법한 아름다운 그래픽을 표현하였고, 그러데이션 기법을 잘 사용하여 따뜻하고 몽환적인 느낌을 주었다.
특히, 게임 플레이 중간중간 할아버지의 과거 회상 장면이 나오는데 그때 나오는 일러스트들이 정말 아름다웠다. 
개발사가 깨알 같은 부분들에 신경을 쓴 것들이 보였는데 창문을 클릭하면 창문이 닫힌다거나 종을 클릭하면 소리가 난다거나 하는 부분은 정말 좋았다.

게임의 볼륨은 작아 아쉽지만 조용히 잔잔하게 즐길 수 있는 게임이다.

[b]현대인의 바쁜 일상을 잠시나마 달래줄 수 있는 따뜻한 인디게임[/b]
[spoiler]할아버지 기여어[/spoiler]

7.6/10

39085006.review:
[h1] DISCLAIMER: This is a full review, and NOT a first impressions review [/h1]

Old Man's Journey is a game developed and published by Broken Rules

Old Man's Journey is a charming little story about... an old man and his journey (I know right, go figure?) and is wrapped in some light puzzle elements. It requires no understanding of any language, but that of the human heart

It's a very simple game with a single gameplay mechanic, transform the landscape to form a path forward but it keeps things interesting just enough, by adding in slight alterations and extra obstacles to the mechanic to keep it from getting too stale and it also introduces these changes perfectly

The game also has a lot of charm and the art style alone made me smile and marvel in awe at the beautiful art style. It's a short, sweet and gorgeous game and it will certainly leave an imprint on you if you're sensitive to sappy stories

38972213.review:
Sorry, I wanted to like this game. The premise is interesting and there are much you could do with what they where trying to do. But the execution leaves much to be desired. For what pretty much is a sidescrolling walking simulator, there's surprisingly little in the way of interaction with the surroundings or storytelling in general. The story is basically told with a static screen at the end of each chapter that give you the backstory whenever the old man sees something that triggers a memory. There is no reward for exploration or even any exploration at all since it's entirely linear. It's also VERY predictable, you can pretty much in detail tell how the story will end after just a few chapters. 

The puzzle part of the game is you dragging the various paths and hills in the various background layers to connect new paths so that you can continue your journey. For the most part, the puzzles are pretty basic and is never challenging, there are a few special obstacles but it's just something for you to do when you walk around since there really isn't much interactions apart from that.

The visuals are pretty much the only selling point for me, it really does look great. A missed opportunity in my opinion.

I would never be able to write an objective review on "Old Man's Journey". This simple but beautiful story has touched a few personal chords that resonated in me in a strong way.

If you have put aside one or more important people in your life, this short interactive story might help you to think about your experiences, maybe to heal a few wounds and hopefully to encourage you to fix things before it's too late.

Don't think about it just as a game: powerful stories go well beyond simple entertainment.

Recommended to everyone who has emotions.

Egy nagyon jó játék lehetett volna belőle. Ígéretesen kezdődik (tetszik a játék megvalósítása). De mikor már kezdtem volna belejönni, egyszer csak véget ért...

[b]Ami jó benne:[/b]
[*]A grafikai megvalósítás tökéletesen illik a játék stílusához.

[b]Ami miatt elbukik:[/b]
[*]Nagyon rövid. Én, aki nem szokott végigrohanni egy játékon, kevesebb mint 2 óra alatt végigjátszottam. Csak lestem a végénél, hogy ennyi volt...?!
[*]A történet egyszerű, és hamar rá lehet jönni mi várhat minket a végén.
[*]Nagyon könnyen meg lehet oldani a továbbjutáshoz a feladványokat. Egy gyereknek okozhat kihívást, de már egy tinédzser is könnyedén teljesíti azokat.

Un jour on reçoit une lettre qui nous oblige à bouleverser notre vie bien rangée et à parcourir le monde. C'est ainsi que ce vieil homme pris son sac et parcouru des vallées, des prairies, à pied, en train, en pickup, à la nage... Pour avancer le joueur doit moduler le paysage en abaissant ou élevant le niveau des collines, des routes,... Ce voyage est l'occasion de se remettre en question et plus il avance dans son périple plus il se remémore sa vie passée à travers des flashbacks. Un chemin de croix comme pour se laver de ses choix passés. 
Une idée très originale. Un jeu sans difficulté.  Des tableaux pastels de toute beauté! Une musique douce et discrète. 
J'ai adoré ce jeu/story teller que j'ai trouvé très reposant après une journée harassante. Il est bien trop court, quel dommage. Pour son originalité et sa poésie, je recommande!

This is the kind of high-quality, bite-sized tablet experiences that I've been saying we need more of. Its short length, vague story, and puzzle nature remind me of Monument Valley, although Monument Valley was a far more polished experience.
Old Man's Journey is beautiful. The music is great, almost too great to the point of being distracting. The story is entirely predictable and occasionally derivative, but sweet. The mechanic is...
It's pretty lame. What few variances there are in the gameplay rarely provide any intellectual challenge, which would be OK if the mechanic was thematically appropriate, as it is in Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons. Unfortunately, gameplay and story never weave in a cohesive way.
Defintely worth $5 and an afternoon if you are looking to unwind.

A brief but touching point-and-click game with an unusual terraforming mechanic, gorgeous art, and great music. It has replay value in the sense that it's like a sweet film you'll put on again, some quiet afternoon or evening months or years later, when the right mood strikes.

I stumbled upon it while going through scntfc's profile on Spotify because I'm a fan of Oxenfree and its art and soundtrack. That might be why I felt both games use similar sounds and color palettes (though Oxenfree's is darker, of course), but they are each their own experience.

37817235.review:
I teared up a bit in the end, and I did not expect that, because I knew how the game would end from the very beginning. Reflecting on this, however, I realize that the combination of a beautiful art style, simple music and a heartfelt story (no matter how predictable) was enough to create a wonderful, unique, little journey -- a journey that at its completion almost felt like my own.

Besides pointing and clicking to move, the only other game mechanic is the ability to shape the environment to move forward. These are sometimes designed as little puzzles, and they are very easy to finish, so the flow of the game is not interrupted.

Old Man's Journey should appeal to most casual gamers that like a good story and atmosphere.

37734601.review:
Calme et relaxant tel un poème, Old Man’s Journey propose un agréable moment tout en douceur tant grâce à son univers esthétique coloré que par son histoire.
Présenté sous forme de puzzle, on suit le chemin d’un vieil homme aux allures de marin vers une destination inconnue. Ses pas le mènent par monts et par vaux à travers différents paysages verdoyants entrecoupés de pauses nostalgiques le rappelant à des souvenirs lointains. 

Le gameplay proposé pour cette expérience est assez simple et les puzzles peu diffciles. Le joueur interagît avec le niveau des différentes surfaces afin de faire sauter notre voyageur d’une colline à une autre et ainsi le mener dans le paysage suivant. Au fil des souvenirs retrouvés au cours de son voyage, on brode peu à peu l’histoire de la vie de notre personnage, donnant à son périple des allures de pèlerinage. 

Au terme de cette expérience d’1h30/2h, après avoir parcouru tant de distance, notre voyageur atteint sa destination…celle d’une vie. 

Bien que court et relativement simple, le chemin parcouru au travers de ce jeu ne m’a pas lassé et m’a fait passer un agréable et doux moment.

[h1]La volontà smuove le montagne![/h1]
Casual game indie creato dagli austriaci Broken Rules che, attraverso FANTASTICI artwork animati, musiche malinconiche e un gameplay drag and drop, riesce a catapultarci per un [b]paio d'ore[/b] nella vita di un anziano lupo di mare e i suoi ricordi, mentre affronta uno dei più significativi viaggi della sua vita.
Assolutamente consigliato se apprezzate l'arte visiva e i disegni a pastello, le storie strappalacrime e i gameplay semplici e intuitivi, supportati da una sapiente tecnica.
In questo caso specifico, quello che bisognerà fare in ciascuno dei 15 livelli sarà alzare e abbassare parti di paesaggio trascinandole, o spostare particolari usando il movimento del mouse, per consentire al protagonista "diversamente giovane" di procedere lungo un percorso. Il fatto è che non sempre il suddetto percorso sarà così immediato... come nella realtà! ;-D

Io dico sempre che il valore di un gioco non si misura in ore giocate ma in quello che ti lascia. Consiglierei però l'acquisto di questo titolo su Humble bundle o durante i saldi di Steam, data la rigiocabilità praticamente assente. ;-)

Old man's Journey is a very short game (i.e., around 2 hours) which is part a walking simulator and part a puzzle game. As the titular "Old man", you travel around various gorgeous looking landscapes trying to reach to your destination. I wouldn't say it is a great game but considering the low price tag and easy atmosphere it is a nice little game.

Pros:
- Very gorgeous looking landscapes. 
- Good atmosphere
- Conveys the story and the emotions without using any voice acting which is a remarkable achievement.

Cons:
- This is a short simple game, heavy on atmosphere. However, the puzzle mechanics doesn't go well with the atmosphere and it feels like a separate game.

35215057.review:
[h1][url=store.steampowered.com/app/581270/Old_Mans_Journey/]Old Man's Journey[/url] is a cute storybook adventure, contemplative and relaxing, in which you bend the land to move forward.[/h1]

Traverse lovely serene landscapes. Sit and rest at every opportunity. Displace sheep. Observe a series of charming flashbacks rendered as beautiful live paintings, where the happy memories become progressively sadder.

The game's single original mechanic lets you manipulate smooth curves in the ground to significantly alter perspective and solve a minority of light physics-based puzzles. Simple, clever.

On the down side, the game is very brief without replay incentives. Some stuttering during the train segment and texture glitches in underwater scene leave room for improvement. Otherwise it's a uniformly excellent and heartfelt adventure.

[i]Make sure to change the game's default low resolution to your native optimal settings to properly enjoy.[/i]

Simplesmente arte.

Os cenários são desenhados a mão e têm um colorido que parece de giz, muito bonito. As músicas são calmas e remetem à nostalgia.

Aliás, nostalgia é algo recorrente nesse jogo. Nós começamos na pele de um idoso que recebe uma carta de conteúdo desconhecido. Após lê-la, ele decide sair em uma jornada na qual memórias de seus passado vêm à tona.

Não há nada de extraordinário nas lembranças, nada que alguém com alguma vivência já não passou: alegrias, tristezas e arrependimentos. No caso do nosso protagonista, muito arrependimento.

Apesar de possuir puzzles simples e ser um walk simulator 2d, é um jogo riquíssimo em narrativa. Isso sem usar sequer uma palavra, escrita ou falada.

跟随老人跋山涉水，去往各地旅行，有多少年也依旧的午后的屋顶，有夕阳西下的温暖的海湾，有和水手们喝着美酒唱着歌的星夜，有翻越山丘与低谷的小火车。。每一段旅程的短暂的停留，都有老人年少时留下的回忆，关于朋友友情的回忆，关于爱人和女儿爱情和亲情的回忆。

到了老人这种满脸白胡子的年纪，人生已经所剩无几了，一生的大部分都成为了回忆，老人之旅，既是一段人生最后的夕阳之旅，也是一段寻回年少的心路之旅。

等到某一天，老人也不在了，老人自己也成了别人的回忆。


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Côtés positifs : 
- Le jeu a un certain charme visuellement, même si les animations se font trop rares et sont assez rigides. 
- Il a coûté un peu moins d'une dizaine d'euros. 
- Les musiques sont plutôt jolies, même si elles manquent de variété. 
- L'idée de faire des énigmes basées sur le fait de déplacer des montagnes est sympa.

Négatifs :
- Même pas deux heures de jeu. 
- Une histoire tire larme assez bateau. 
- Un manque cruel de variété dans le gameplay. On épuise le concept du jeu au bout de cinq minutes et on répète la même boucle encore et encore.
- Un manque de difficulté qui n'arrange pas l'impression de ne rien faire dans le jeu. 

Au final, on se retrouve avec un énième jeu "poétique" qui se cache derrière de jolis dessins, un scénario un peu cucul et un concept de gameplay sympa pour faire passer une durée de vie médiocre et une boucle de gameplay très répétitive.

Großartiges Spiel! Allerdings ist es nicht das Gameplay, das überzeugt, sondern die künstlerische Umsetzung. Das Artwork und der Soundtrack in Kombination sind der Hammer. Dazu kommt noch die liebevolle Erzählweise der Story. Wenn man ganz ehrlich ist, handelt es sich auch mehr um einen interaktiven Trickfilm, als um ein Computerspiel. Man hat es ohne viel Aufwand schenell durchgezockt. Wirkliche Hürden gibt es nicht. Aber das macht gar nichts. Ich bin absolut begeistert und werde das Spiel sicher diverse Male verschenken. Wer ein richtiges Spiel mit ausgeklügelter Spielmechanik erwartet, der sollte sich besser nach etwas anderem umschauen. 

...übrigens auch eine klare Empfehlung, um Kinder pädagogisch anspruchsvoll an das Thema Computerspiel heranzuführen.

34245466.review:
my review is basically spoilers, ok? 
you know that bit about life, loss and hope in the description? well, if you must know, read on.

SPOILERS FOR THE WHOLE DAMN GAME FOLLOW
SPOILERS
SPOILERS
SPOILERS
SPOILERS
SPOILERS
SPOILERS
SPOILERS
It's a game about a man who drank too much, ran away from responsibility by going to work forever and left his family. Now after his wife is dead he suddenly gets a chance to make up with his daughter and gets a happy ending. Poor daughter. Poor wife. I just found him to be an asshole who left his family and who was forgiven for doing nothing. One could argue that the journey itself would be the trial/trail he must cross to come to terms with his past.
Okay, then, as beautiful as the journey is, it doesnt amount to much narrative-wise. He walks, sits, remember. Maybe the gameplay is supposed to implicitly suggest that we are in a way "making things right" by huh, altering the scenery around him, I guess? Notice that we are the ones doing this. He just walks.
He doesn't, at the very least, say "im sorry" at the end. Maybe for a wordless game, this would be an interesting twist at the end.
Forgive me, the art is so pretty, but there is something inherently mean spirited about this naive story where bad decisions are romanticized ("I am a man of the sea, I like yatchs so bye forever") and forgiveness seems to mean so little ("okay mom is dying I forgive you, you really liked boats, right? lets go sail on one").
If this emotional journey was anything but the point of the whole damn game, maybe it would be palatable. But it's not.

34172503.review:
Se trata de un juego simple y rápido, como para jugarlo de forma casual ya sea solo o en compañía de alguien, especialmente si se trata de una persona poco familiarizada con los videojuegos, como un niño pequeño o adultos mayores.

La historia es básica pero bastante efectiva por la manera en que se cuenta, en la que te recompensan con fragmentos de la historia a medida que terminamos cada nivel, mientras vamos formando nuestras teorías sobre qué motivó a nuestro personaje a iniciar su viaje.  Visualmente es hermoso y si bien las mecánicas no son complejas, son entretenidas por el llamativo diseño de cada uno de sus niveles.

Personalmente creo que es importante que existan más aventuras de ese tipo, ya que no siempre se trata de juegos triple A con más de 60 horas de duración. Así como existen novelas literarias interminables con cientos de páginas, también tenemos cuentos cortos para disfrutar en una tarde, con historias simples pero entretenidas. De igual manera eso se puede replicar en los videojuegos, donde una historia corta y bien contada puede tener el mismo o incluso un impacto más grande.

Así que recomiendo totalmente este juego, así sea para jugarlo una sola vez, pero con la misión que después se lo enseñes a un amigo, especialmente ya que se encuentra a un precio bastante accesible y vas a obtener a cambio una experiencia diferente y disfrutable.

34170983.review:
Una bella historia de amor, pérdida y redención. Old Man's Journey toca las botones necesarios para emocionar, entretener y sorprender al mismo tiempo. Recomendadísimo.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mtDdY_aQXTM
Análisis completo publicado [url=https://www.simpatiaporlacritica.com/single-post/2017/08/11/Old-Mans-Journey]aquí[/url]

No es novedad que los estudios indie tienen cada vez más protagonismo en la industria y poco a poco comienzan a torcer el brazo de la concepción de lo que debería ser un "buen juego". Muchos estudios eligieron comenzar su camino de la mano de esta decisión de negocio, a veces con resultados bastante exitosos.
 
Sin embargo, como en todas las ramas del arte, existen los pioneros que usan los mismos materiales que ya se usaron miles de veces, pero para crear algo completamente nuevo. Este es el caso de Broken Rules y su juego Old Man's Journey, una especie de película interactiva, fusionada con aventura y una pizca de arcade del tipo casual. El entorno gráfico invita a soñar un mundo dibujado a mano, con vibrantes colores y escenarios maravillosos.

Si la comparamos con una película, la trama cuenta la historia de un viejo marinero que por muchas malas decisiones y caprichos se fue quedando completamente solo, hasta vivir en una casa al borde del mar. Su vida era monótona y aburrida hasta que una misteriosa carta llegó a su nombre y lo cambió todo. Sin dudarlo, el anciano empacó sus cosas y se lanzó hacia lo desconocido para tratar de recuperar un poco de todo lo que perdió.
 
Las mecánicas responden más a las de un juego casual, por los mini-puzzles a resolver modificando el entorno. Dicho sea de paso, una de las mecánicas más originales que hemos probado en los últimos tiempos. Acompañado por el exquisito entorno gráfico y musical, el juego es un placer para los sentidos en todo momento.
 
A pesar de que el argumento puede considerarse “depresivo”, el juego está llevado con humor, sutileza e inteligencia. También hay que decir que no escapa a los sentimentalismos obvios de la historia, pero en este caso no molestan ni hacen ruido, incluso constituyen el vínculo más fuerte que genera este título con el jugador. Todos los sucesos que ocurren en Old Man's Journey producen verdadera empatía, y logramos conectarnos de lleno con la historia de vida del anciano.
 
El resultado es emotivo, conmovedor y sorprendente. Sin duda una experiencia distinta que vale la pena probar, una pausa entre tantos juegos de combate, acción, competencias y desafíos. Old Man's Journey es la prueba necesaria para demostrar que los videojuegos también pueden ser exitosos apuntando a los sentimientos de los usuarios.

33670550.review:
Old Man's Journey has a fairly interesting game mechanic at its core (aligning different levels so that the old man may reach different parts of the map), but this game truly shines when it comes to its poignant message and imagery. It probably takes some maturity and life experience to be able to fully appreciate its story, since it deals with making choices between the people and things we love, and often having to abandom some of them in order to pursue our other dreams. I have been there, and sometimes I'm not sure walking away was the right choice. This game has made me question some of my previous decisions. It has also forced me to confront the prospect of aging alone, since freedom and happiness are often antithetical and mutually exclusive. Poignant and brilliant gaming experience, even if a bit short.

As a side note, the game is themed with Mediterranean / southern European imagery and is stunningly beautiful.

33612258.review: Absolutely exquisite game. It is rare to find a game that is more like an artistic masterpiece, but this is one of them.  The music helps immerse you in the touching plot and light pastel colors are combined beautifully to create the levels where the environment itself is the puzzle. It's so refreshing to see a point-and-click game that doesn't make you collect items, so in that way it's quite reminiscent of Samorost 3, another great game. There's no dialog, but thanks to the game's simple mechanics, it's not too difficult to figure out what to do to progress. The game may be short, but the story is well expressed in a coherent way that makes it feel like it didn't need to be longer. Lastly, I like how you learn by exploring rather than being taught through a tutorial, it makes it so much more fun and it feels more like an accomplishment when you succeed at a puzzle. Overall great game!

Old Man's Journey foi desenvolvido pela Broken Rules que logo de cara nos brinda com este pequeno título independente.


Enredo: Falar do enredo do game sem dar spoilers é complicado já que o mesmo não tem textos e sim imagens (muito bonitas por sinal) que acabam contando a história do senhor. Basicamente ele está a procura de algo muito importante, o que é? só jogando, mas é bem triste e ao mesmo tempo emocionante.

Ambientação, gráficos e arte: Os pontos mais altos do pequeno jogo estão aqui, a arte de Old Man's Journey é impecável e junto com seus gráficos bonitos e lembrando desenhos fica ainda melhor, sem contar a ambientação fantástica, basicamente cada fase do jogo paramos para admirar, é realmente uma pintura a cada imagem tirada e rende belas imagens para enviar para sua galeria da Steam. Impecável em gráficos, ambientação e principalmente no design e arte.

Nota: 10/10

Trilha sonora: Calma e relaxante e muito bem feita, não é enjoativa e combina com cada fase e momentos mais tristes do jogo, impecável.

Nota: 10/10

Dificuldade, opções de gráficos, resoluções e Puzzles: Não contamos com alteração de dificuldade e nem com opções gráficas já que o jogo é lindo por sí só. Porém contamos com todas resoluções disponíveis e alterações no volume do game e música. Sobre a dificuldade dos Puzzles basicamente o jogador vai interagir com o mundo de maneira bem simples e relaxante, não espere nenhuma dificuldade do jogo, basta mover montanhas e liberar caminhos para o protagonista seguir sua jornada, simples demais? sim, mas para a proposta totalmente aceito.

Nota: 8/10

Performance: Acredito que o jogo rode em qualquer computador mediano e até mesmo os mais fracos, impecável.

Nota: 10/10

Cartas Steam e conquistas: O jogo possui cartas Steam. Porém, não possui conquistas. 

Nota? ?/10

Duração: um ponto negativo na minha opinião, o jogo poderia explorar muito mais toda essa ambientação espetacular e essas imagens feitas a mão, assim adicionando mais gameplay ao jogo. Seria demais ver uma história mais longa, mais profunda (não que a história do jogo não seja boa, é ótima como citei anteriormente). Porém, seria legal ter um jogo com puzzles mais complicados e uma narrativa mais longa.

Nota: 5/10

Preço: Eu comprei em FULL PRICE porque realmente amo jogos deste estilo e gostei muito de ter jogado essa curta experiência. Porém, jogadores que querem desafios, mais história, puzzles complexos vão sair decepcionados. Minha dica é a seguinte: Se você é fã de jogos independentes feitos com amor pelos desenvolvedores e que contam uma história bonitinha que beira ao emocionante com uma ambientação fantástica e uma arte de encher os olhos, vá e pegue full price, por outro lado os que querem uma experiência mais duradoura e com conquistas da Steam é melhor comprar o jogo com desconto de 50% a 60%.

Old Man's Journey falha na sua curta duração, mas acerta em todos os outros detalhes. O jogo é mais uma experiência que mesmo curta acaba por trazer belas imagens, uma arte de encher os olhos, nenhum bug e um jogo extremamente relaxante. 

Eu recomendo.

Old Man's Journey

Broken Rules' Old Man's Journey is a lovely experience, where you follow and guide an old man through the 
consequence of his life decisions - Without a single word. 

In a beautiful landscape, you help him "find his way" through the world and his memories.

The gameplay was fun, simple and a new way (at least for me) to do a 'puzzle game'. I really liked the possibilities in all the interactions.

33436476.review:
[b]Old Man's Journey[/b] is a short indie adventure game with charming graphics, a touching story and a unique gameplay mechanic.
If this review is too long for you, I suggest you to only read the first paragraph about the game's content and the final verdict at the end.

Check out this review and many others on Save or Quit: http://saveorquit.com/2017/07/21/review-old-mans-journey/

[h1]What is happening in the game:[/h1]
One day, an old man gets visited by a postman and he receives a letter. He knows right away that he must travel to the sender of the letter and you must guide him through all the obstacles and puzzles in order to assure he completes his journey. While you do that, the old man reveals tiny bits of his not so fortunate past, which together tell the full story of his life.

[h1]Pros:[/h1]
[list]
    [*][b]Story[/b] | One of the most praised aspects of this game is certainly its story. What starts as a peaceful journey with no clear path, ends in a somewhat tragic and touching adventure of an old man. I don't want to reveal too many details about the story, so I'll just say that the Old Man's Journey is all about reuniting the old man with his family. The story does become a bit predictable as you progress, but that doesn't make it any less beautiful, so that shouldn't bother you too much.
    [*][b]Graphics[/b] | The graphics are stunning, the developers really made an effort doing them. If I understand correctly, everything is hand-drawn, which is also a huge plus. Animations are also quite well-made, I really loved the level where you have to drive a truck across the countryside.
    [*][b]Intriguing Gameplay[/b] | When I first launched the game, I was quite surprised when I saw that this game is not solely a fun adventure puzzle game with no special twists. When I got stuck about ten minutes into the game, I suddenly discovered that you can actually move the landscape in order to reach your goal! There's a trick, though: you can't move the part of the landscape you're currently standing on, so you have to move around a little and try to figure our how to change the environment in a certain way.
    [*][b]Soundtrack[/b] | If you look at the Store Page for this game, one of the user-defined tags displayed says "Great Soundtrack" and I can only agree with that. There are 12 songs featured in this game, each fitting the atmosphere of the associated scene and story. The soundtrack was made by Scntfc, who is also signed under the Oxenfree's amazing soundtrack.
    [*][b]Puzzles[/b] | This paragraph is in some way related to the one about the moving landscape, but I wanted to write a few more words about how well-made is the progression of the puzzles in Old Man's Journey. There are a few different elements which you have to figure out, not only the thing with the landscape. Each type of puzzle is first introduced with a super simple environment with its only mission to show you how things work. After a while, the puzzles get a tiny bit harder and they make you think a bit. The puzzles never get extremely hard and you can't lose in any way, so you don't have to be all stressed out. You can take it easy, the game will wait until you figure everything out.
[/list]

[h1]Cons:[/h1]
[list]
    [*][b]Length[/b] | The game is a bit over an hour long, which is slightly disappointing. If you're smarter than the average gamer, you can probably finish it in even less than that. That hour was certainly a very enjoyable one, but I still think that everything ended a bit too soon, although the story couldn't really be stretched any further without becoming boring.
    [*][b]No Achievements[/b] | I know it's the story that matters, but it never hurts to include a little extra to cheer people up and make them keep going. Sadly, there are no achievements in this game and it would really be nice to have at least a few of them.
    [*][b]Pricing[/b] | For the amount of content that is included, I can't say that $8 is a justified price. The game is just too short and even though the story and the graphics are really lovely, there should still be something more to fill in the void.
[/list]

[h1]The final verdict:[/h1]
The only real problem this game has is being too short and therefore the price should probably be adjusted a bit. I certainly enjoyed the story and the unique gameplay, which made a big impression on me. The puzzles were quite interesting and it's uncommon to see such ingenuity in puzzle games.
If you're unsure whether to buy this game or not, I would suggest you wait for a discount, even if only for a small one. I enjoyed every minute of the gameplay and if you're a fan of similar adventure games, definitely keep an eye out for this one.

With love,
BirdCute

33419153.review:
Old Man’s Journey feels like a kids book that was made for adults. 

Before we start I just want to get this off my chest.

Alluring, appealing, charming, cute, dazzling, delicate, delightful, elegant, exquisite, fascinating, fine, good-looking, gorgeous, graceful, grand, handsome, lovely, magnificent, marvelous, pleasing, pretty, splendid, stunning, superb, wonderful, admirable, angelic, beauteous, bewitching, classy, comely, divine, enticing, excellent, fair, foxy, ideal, nice, pulchritudinous, radiant, ravishing, refined, resplendent, shapely, sightly, statuesque, sublime, symmetrical, taking. — There that’s every synonym for beautiful and how I feel about Old Man’s Journey’s art. Yes, I even learned a new word pulchritudinous; go google that one.

Why go to all that trouble in listing those words? Well, Old’s Man Journey is definitely a game that falls into the category of gamer art. This is a short bite-sized sweet experience that you will enjoy wrapped up in your blankets while sipping hot chocolate.  This isn’t as robust as other ‘GameArt’ titles such as “Everything” or deeply engrossing like “Journey”. Old Man’s Journey is pleasant, simply put. It does exactly what it needs to, in the correct amount, and never hits a snag. This game is made extremely well and I can’t recommend this game enough.

I have seen a recent surge in these types of games and I hope it continues and flourishes. If you enjoyed Burly Men at Sea, then this is right up your alley. Old Man’s Journey is a storybook that you get to play with, gasp at its superb art and probably cry a little. One thing of note though is that while the games tone is delightful, it may raise some trigger flags for younger kids. Especially those without fathers, so take that as you will.

At its core Old Man’s Journey is a story but it also has to be a game too right?

Just like everything else about this title, the game mechanics are short and sweet. You play the old man on his journey. Duh. While on his journey though, you will help him along as he traverses terrain. Formerly a Navy man, he picks up his stick and bag and starts hot footing it across hills, cities, plains, you name it.

Where you as the player come in is adjusting how the terrain is laid out, literally. You can pull and push hills, roads, and tracks around so that they line up. This is purely done with your mouse as there is no controller support. Then the old man just simply hops to the next layer to get where he needs to go. At first it feels a little odd watching the old man sink farther into the background or move closer but you eventually get a zen going and you hardly notice. The puzzle aspect is simple but the developer adds a little more complexity as you go. Hills become two sided, old stone walls begin to block your path and waterfalls must be managed.

Rest assured though nothing is really that hard. It’s more of relaxing experience then any kind of a puzzle game. You are going to make progress no matter what usually and there is no game over. Now this is the only ‘game’ aspect to Old Man’s Journey and I am completely okay with this. The rest of the game more then makes up for it with its (looks at list) DAZZLING art and soundtrack. There are moments when the game mechanics shine and make me smile. When you board a train and have to quickly begin lining up the tracks ahead was fun and challenging to keep up with.

As you complete sections of the game you are rewarded with a memory and this is where the art kicks into breathtaking detail and the story unfolds.

Did I mention the art was (looks at list) angelic?

While I am sure you are growing tired of me mentioning the art, the details, the use of color in playful ways never ceased to amaze me. The art itself does tell its own story on top of the actual story. There was an anime that I watched long time ago called Robot Carnival. The anime displayed a broad range of stories, art styles and themes. Old Man’s Journey captured for me those same feelings. At the start you feel wondrous and adventurous, then there are times you will feel sad and lonely. This never stops you from admiring the storm and scenery even in the bleakest of moments. That speaks to how well controlled the tone is in Old Man’s Journey.

Then Old Man’s Journey will shift its tone and the storm clears and you are seeing a whale jump out of the water. These moments, while small, have a huge impact. They did for me anyway.

Usually now is when I would start talking about story. I am not going to do that. This is a title that is best enjoyed on your own. What I will say is, Old Man’s Journey does deal with some rather serious topics. Even if it approaches those in a family friendly and delightful way. There are times this feels odd. The entire aesthetic feels very warm and friendly but there are times where as they say, “s**t gets real.”
To balance, control, and support that tone we have the music and everything else.

The soundtrack for Old Man’s Journey is as playful as its art style. There are many styles of music that were incorporated into the game. While it is all instrumental, that doesn’t stop the game from exploring music as much as you are exploring the world in your journey. Visiting an exotic village location usually has some really fun beats to match. There is as much attention paid to the music as the rest of the game.

The sound effects are expertly crafted to coordinate with the games sound effects. I could listen to the sea crashing against the cliffs for hours. Thunderstorms feel even more powerful with the soundtrack coming behind it. It’s something you will hardly notice but that’s because the developer weaved it together so well.

You can currently purchase the soundtrack on Steam and if you enjoy instrumental music, you won’t be disappointed.
There are very few issues I could find with Old Man’s Journey.

The game does what exactly what it set out to do. That said, there are areas that the game will come up short because of what it is. For one, the game does have a heavy App like feeling. You can tell that this game is on multiple mobile devices. This is abundantly obvious from the menus and how you navigate the game. While this didn’t particularly bother me, it might be irksome to others.

Old Man’s Journey is a short adventure, topping out for me at a total of two hours game time. You could stretch that in either direction but its not going to stray too far. Like I said earlier, it’s a short but sweet game. Replay value is also going to be questionable at best. You may enjoy playing this title over and over again for its relaxing nature, but just keep in mind what it is. A lovely little story.

Currently there are Steam cards but no achievements and I don’t really expect there to be any. It just doesn’t seem like it would fit for this type of game. That can change of course.
We have come to the end of our own journey.

I had an amazing time with Old Man’s Journey. It was fun, unique, sad, and wonderful all at the same time. For that alone it deserves your attention, as its hard to capture all that in one experience. It may not be reinventing the wheel as far as the game industry goes, but its perfect for what it is. I personally want more titles like Old Man’s Journey. These experiences are akin to books, in that they let you escape the ordinary world, giving you access to explore art, music, and emotions. If that isn’t what gaming is all about, then I don’t know what is. The cherry on top is that you can get Old Man’s Journey for relatively low price.

If you are looking for something that you can relax, enjoy, and surrender to on a emotional and visual level, then look no further than Old Man’s Journey.

33417573.review:
Jsem velký fanda "feel-good" žánru. Nenáročný, někdy až relaxační zážitek, kde nasednete na emocionální horskou dráhu, která vás nakonec naplní pozitivní energií. Vy po takové zkušenosti odcházíte s úsměvem na rtech a vidinou na lepší zítřky. Oproti kruté realitě zde všechno dobře skončí, všichni jsou šťastní, všechno vyjde a vy tak můžete alespoň na chvíli zapomenout na vaše trable a každodenní depresi. No není to krásné? 

Old Mans Journey pak přesně takovou "feel-good" hrou je. Pěkný a lehce srozumitelný příběh beze slov, který asi není bůhvíjak originální, ale to také není cílem tohoto žánru. Důležité je, že umí zatlačit na těch správných místech a pohladit po duši. Po dohrání vás tak hřeje příjemný pocit, že život je vlastně fajn. 

Lví podíl na tomto pozitivním zážitku má také pestrobarevná, malebná grafika a milý soundtrack. Hratelnost pak jde celé té atmosféře naproti svými jednoduchými puzzly, kdy je potřeba krajinu měnit tak, aby mohl náš děda postupovat dál. To se sice může zdát po čase repetitivní, ale hra skončí dřív, než celý tento nápad začne nudit. Kombinací toho všeho má pak hraní hry skoro až meditační účinek. Nic vás nežere. 

Pokud vás podobný typ her a filmů baví stejně jako mě, můžu tuto pěknou jednohubku doporučit všemi deseti a to ze tří důvodů: 
1. Je to fakt dobré. 
2. Na steamu to i teď pořídíte za pár šupů. 
3. Takovýchto "feel-good" her je jako šafránu.

Old Man's Journey feels like a project with so much potential -- wasted.

When I came into this game, I was thinking it would be an epic journey that would bring this man to reflect on his life along the way, learning from mistakes or making more, trying to redeem his past sins or... something. Ever read Siddhartha (the book)? I thought it might be like that. What we got... was a subpar puzzle game with an uninteresting/cliché story, downright boring gameplay, with a pretty face. There's not much to talk about because the game is so short --- The only reason I have 3 hours is because i left it running at home when I went shopping and returned 2 hours later.

The game is nice to look at, but its nothing special. It doesn't stand up against, say, Ori and the Blind Forest. Exploration is not interesting though, because the game is completely linear, and the environments are fairly similar and repetitive. Although, you can play this on pretty much any computer. It is not graphics-intensive in the slightest-- which is good for me, my computer is sh*t. The puzzles rely on two basic, maybe three mechanics if you really nitpick. That's it.

What if this game had been told like a classical epic? An Odyssey, or a spiritual journey which would bring both the protagonist and the player to a deeper understanding of themselves and the world around them? Unfortunately, there's nothing here worth spending 8 dollars. Go find something else.

P.S. If you do know of a game like the one this could have been, please let me know! =)

两情相悦，浪漫与甜蜜都在一天天。
于船上约定，于船上相结。

离开家，离开她和她。

两手紧握心不离。
一眼相见如初见。
再见已是黄泉路。

父女想拥而泣。
年轻时做的决定，总有痛心的代价。
父女相伴不离，已是最好的结局。

32838588.review:
A quietly meditative, serene and whimsical game with STUNNING ART!! I bought it for the art alone and was not disappointed in the least. I spent a lot of time just marvelling at the exquisite talent behind the Memories scenes ~ props to Salon Alpin for fantastic work! You can get lost in the beauty of the art and also the incredible music, which fitted the game to a tee. This game surpasses all others in terms of the art style.

The gameplay is basically spatial puzzles and connect-the-lines puzzles, which is not too taxing and quite fun but also frustrating in parts. Just the right mix of light difficulty to leave you plenty of room to fully enjoy the immersive visual experience and the very endearing old man, who I lost my heart to. 

Thank you Broken Rules, for an incredibly visually rich and melt-my-heart game that took my breath away with every scene. I don't think I have taken this many screenshots of a 3 hour game in my life. THANK YOU!!

32748312.review:
This game left me with a strange feeling. I lost all sympathy with the egocentric old man rather quickly when I learned why he is on this journey of redemption, and didn't regain it even with the ending you see coming a thousand movable hills away.

The simple concept is well executed, though, with a little journey through a beautiful landscape. Is this a puzzle game? Maybe for my youngest kid. Maybe. The simplicity of the puzzles made the journey at times somewhat tedious and stretched. That said, the music and art are tonally perfect, even if the narrative left me annoyed.

It's a game I'd recommend for the overall concept and experience, not for the story or puzzles, which I realize is a very half-hearted recommendation.

32740482.review:
This game is about an old man on drugs who wanders around aimlessly through melting landscapes. Occasionally he has flashbacks to his ancestors -- much like Altair in Assassin's Creed -- who traveled to Skyrim. Then he painted a house. 

The question here is: Can a game succeed only (or mostly) through charm alone? The answer is yes, but just barely. Some of the puzzles are idiotic, but for the most part it's a cute little diversion. The story is nothing remarkable, but it's decent. 

Is it worth full price? Not really. 

Should you buy it during a sale? Perhaps. 

Am I glad I received it as a gift? Absolutely.

32576218.review:
Eine Geschichte über die Vergänglichkeit, das Zerrinnen der Zeit – und der verpassten Chancen.

Auch wenn ich insgesamt eine negative Wertung abgebe, möchte ich vorausschicken:

Dieses kleine Spiel ist wunderschön gezeichnet und liebevoll gestaltet.

 
Nun aber zu den positiven und negativen Faktoren:

Die Geschichte selbst ist zwar philosophisch angelegt,
hat mich aber bei weitem nicht so beeindruckt und emotional berührt wie beispielsweise „Brothers: A tale of two sons“ von Starbreeze oder „Unravel“ von Coldwood. (ähnliche Themen: Vergänglichkeit/verlorene Liebe etc)

Das Schicksal des alten Mannes plätschert hier in kleinen Häppchen eher dahin und berührt mich nicht so elementar, wie es viele andere Spieler empfunden haben. (vielleicht auch, weil ich ständig mit der nervigen Steuerung beschäftigt war)

Hier meine Pros und Cons.

Pro:

- grafisch wunderschön gestaltet
- nette, entspannende und toll komponierte Musik
- kommt ohne Dialoge aus
- relativ kurze, knackige Spielzeit und nicht künstlich gestreckt

 Cons:
- total umständliche, fummelige und nervige Steuerung (sprich Rätsel, denn die Steuerung ist 
  eigentlich das Rätsel und mehr Herausforderungen gibt es eigentlich nicht...)
- Schicksal des Alten und seiner Familie bleibt oberflächlich und nur punktuell anrührend
- Speichern immer nur kapitelweise möglich
- wenig zu entdecken bzw. wenige Interaktion mit der Landschaft oder Umgebung
- trotz der Kürze alles in allem irgendwie langweilig
 
Fazit:

7,5 von 10

朝闻道，夕死可矣。

32194640.review:
https://youtu.be/bTokjNZ5gvA

Old man’s journey est une aventure interactive qui vous met dans la  peau d’un bonhomme âgé recevant une lettre intriguante…et il décide de partir.

A vous de créer un chemin dans les décors pour permettre au vieux monsieur de traverser les tableaux.
Comment ? En rabaissant ou en montant les différents éléments du décor afin de créer des jonctions et permettre au vieux monsieur de passer.
Le gameplay est limité, je dirai presque digne d’une expérience mobile, d’ailleurs, il y aurait totalement sa place.
MAIS !
Bien que le gameplay soit très limité, la force du jeu vient surtout de son ambiance artistique et de son côté « contemplatif », même si je trouve les premières scènes franchement plus poétiques. La patte graphique, tout en couleur pastel fait le taf de manière parfaite, on prend plaisir à suivre notre papy dans ces environnements et on a envie de savoir à quoi ressemble la scène suivante. N’oubliez pas de passer votre curseur sur les éléments.

La musique est discrète, relaxante, pas forcément marquante, mais agréable et cohérente.

Une expérience agréable, qui cherche à vous toucher avec une histoire d’un papy qui tente de se rappeler sa vie au fur et à mesure de son voyage,  j’imagine que c’est une métaphore pas très subtile. Étant nostalgique des « meilleurs jours », je pense que je serai ce genre d’ancien, à se souvenir de « ha je me souviens quand…, ha,, je me rappelle ceci », je me suis senti proche de ce vénérable ancêtre.

3 bémols :

-	La durée de vie extra courte : 1 h 30 pour 8 €
-	Certains tableaux sont moins jolis, moins « œuvre d’art».
-	Gmeplay limité

Une courte expérience, pleine de poésie, tout en douceur, tout en nostalgie, chez moi ça a fait mouche, mais gardez à l’esprit que cet essai vidéoludique ne demande pas beaucoup d'investissement du joueur et qu’il est fort succinct.

"Le voyage du vieil homme est une belle fable de moins de deux heures (79 minutes en ce qui me concerne) qui nous laisse suivre l’épopée d’un inconnu vieillard recevant une lettre qui l’alerte au plus haut point. Tout au long de son périple, le joueur devra jouer avec les décors pour frayer un chemin au vieil homme et en découvrir davantage, à chaque pause sur un banc, sur le passé de ce si sympathique protagoniste. Rapidement, le scénario classique au demeurant parvient à accrocher les plus férus de poésie. Surtout, l’aventure est sans aucun temps mort.

Forcément trop court pour certains, évidemment trop simple pour d’autres, Old Man’s Journey n’est rien d’autre qu’un peu de tendresse dans un monde de brutes. Un très bon moment à passer qu’il serait bête de ne pas se lancer. Surtout qu’artistiquement, avec ses visuels sublimes et sa musique qui nous emporte, ce jeu à la narration bien amenée est on ne peut plus envoûtant. Une petite création dédiée aux joueurs qui ont un cœur."

31934720.review:
A jogabilidade é simples, e remete aos jogos clássicos de aventura. Apenas com o mouse, ou com o dedo sobre a tela tátil, o jogador interage com o cenário e comanda os movimentos do protagonista, o velho homem do título. A novidade se encontra justamente no uso de profundidade durante a aventura 2D. O cenário possui planos diferentes, e o jogador pode fazer com que esse planos se movimentem para criar novos caminhos para que o velho homem alcance seu objetivo. Apesar de criativos, os puzzles não são particularmente desafiadores, e mesmo quem não está acostumado com o gênero pode finalizar Old Man’s Journey em pouco mais de uma hora. Duas, se o devido tempo for investido apenas apreciando as belíssimas paisagens desenhadas à mão.

(...)

A arte é linda. Os puzzles são criativos. Mas o que torna Old Man’s Journey memorável é justamente seu conjunto narrativo. O jogo é mais um exemplo de como é possível abandonar a linguagem verbal e ainda manter uma construção complexa de personagens. Sem as barreiras da diferença de língua, Old Man’s Journey desvela sua narrativa aos poucos, por meio das lembranças que o velho homem tem ao longo de sua jornada, rumo a um destino desconhecido, e motivada por uma misteriosa carta.

(...)

Sem grandes viradas de roteiro, o objetivo de Old Man’s Journey é contar uma estória universal, e já muito conhecida. Sobre sonhos, perdas, a necessidade de ver o mundo e se conectar com as pessoas. Essa simplicidade, presente em todos os aspectos do jogo, não significa um demérito. Quando bem construída, mesmo a mais simples das narrativas é capaz de emocionar.

------------------------------------------------------------------

31922438.review:
Recensione di [url=http://www.icrewplay.com/recensione-old-mans-journey/]iCrewPlay[/url]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GjM48uUFmzE

Una storia di rimpianti e malinconia

Il postino che consegna la lettera in bicicletta è solo il primo indizio dell’atmosfera retrò e malinconica che respireremo di continuo, una lettera che porta cattive notizie a giudicare dall’espressione del vecchio signore che dovremo guidare nel suo viaggio. Un attimo di riflessione, poi la decisione: si parte. Non si sa dove né perché, ma scoprirlo diventa imperativo per noi che già da subito ci stiamo affezionando a questo vecchietto solitario, che potrebbe essere nostro nonno.

Già dal primo quadro possiamo capire due cose: la musica sarà la nostra unica compagnia, nessun dialogo se non qualche rumore della vita che scorre attorno; dovremo scoprire da soli come muoverci ed interagire con l’ambiente.
Ah, la terza cosa è che ci innamoreremo subito dei paesaggi, usciti direttamente da un acquerello o da un disegno a tempera dai colori caldi, tipici dei paesaggi mediterranei perfettamente in linea con il mare che fa da leitmotiv della storia ed è sempre presente, calmo e placido o tempestoso con le onde che si infrangono sugli scogli. E le nuvole, altra caratterizzazione che è impossibile non notare, sempre diverse ed in linea con il paesaggio ed il punto della storia in cui siamo.

Toni caldi ed avvolgenti per questi paesaggi dal sapore mediterraneo
In questo ambiente non ci si può scordare che il protagonista è una persona anziana, che spesso ha bisogno di riposare e quando lo fa non riesce a trattenere i ricordi, che viviamo anche noi sotto forma di immagini. Ricordi del passato che inevitabilmente portano malinconia e cominciano a delineare una storia che ci lascia immaginare lo scopo del viaggio.

NOTE TECNICHE

La versione che abbiamo testato è quella per PC disponibile su Steam.

C’è stata un po’ di difficoltà iniziale nel comprendere il meccanismo del gioco, senza nessuna spiegazione, che costringe il giocatore a fare un punta e clicca casuale nel paesaggio. Ma bastano al massimo tre quadri per avere perfettamente chiaro il tutto, per capire che stiamo giocando ad un puzzle in cui incastrare i pezzi con delle regole precise, in cui ogni elemento dell’ambiente ha la sua funzione, dall’acqua, alle piante agli animali. E quando abbiamo tutto finalmente chiaro e ci rilassiamo pensando di goderci una storia facendo solo qualche click ogni tanto, ecco che il tutto si complica, diventa un tetris ad incastro nel tentativo di costruire il percorso per portare il personaggio dall’inizio alla fine del quadro che richiede un ragionamento e diversi tentativi.

E’ il player che modifica la geografia del paesaggio

Il mondo di gioco non è fisso, ma possiamo modellarlo a nostro piacimento, anzi dobbiamo modellarlo per permettere gli spostamenti del protagonista. Il punta e clicca casuale iniziale ha come pregio quello di farci scoprire che non solo possiamo interagire con il territorio, ma anche con gli elementi secondari: accendere una radio, mettere in moto una macchina, chiudere una finestra, tutte azioni che rendono il mondo circostante meno distante, non è solo uno “sfondo” ma è un pezzo del percorso.

Non si muore, non ci si fa male, non si deve ricominciare. Al massimo si cade, si deve risalire una collina da cui si è scivolati, si perde l’equilibrio nell’acqua o ci si deve fermare per non aver svolto un’azione con sufficiente rapidità, ma la frustrazione del gamer che si blocca davanti ad un ostacolo è ciò che di più lontano ci possa essere da questo gioco. La cosa più complessa da superare che possa capitare è il rimodellamento per tentativi ed errori del territorio, ma anche il più difficile di questi puzzle non richiede più di qualche minuto.
L’assenza di difficoltà del gameplay si sposa perfettamente con lo scopo del gioco, che è quello di vivere semplicemente una storia, l’alternativa interattiva alla lettura di una novella.

La longevità di Old Man’s Journey è assolutamente assente, si porta a termine in meno di un paio d’ore e giocarlo nuovamente è come leggere due volte lo stesso libro. Il che però è in linea con la distribuzione poiché oltre che in Steam sarà scaricabile da Google Play ed Apple Store. In effetti si nota che è molto più adatto a sistemi mobile vista la totale assenza di interazioni che non siano il punta e clicca, l’equivalente del touch. Adatto per soddisfare i buchi di tempo in cui si può usare il cellulare mentre si usano i mezzi pubblici o si è in fila dal medico.

Al momento in cui prepariamo questa videorecensione il prezzo a cui sarà disponibile il gioco è di € 7.49, può sembrare forse eccessivo in rapporto a longevità e distribuzione, ma è ampiamente giustificato dal lavoro grafico e musicale che c’è dietro, vincitore di diversi premi riservati agli indipendent games.

Complessivamente adatto a chi desidera un gioco tranquillo, senza difficoltà, per rilassarsi e commuoversi un po’, senza pretese di alcun tipo ma con la stessa serenità con cui si gode di un bel panorama.

31919446.review:
[h1]Video Review[/h1]

https://youtu.be/dpwC9kFdEws

[i]Old Man's Journey[/i] just didn't succeed as a game. The gameplay was weak and exceptionally easy, causing the gameplay to lose any engagement. The narrative was typical and bland. There was no nuance to it, that being what makes a narrative really worth following. There was some good use of the environment to reflect the mood of the main character as well as having the main mechanic be somewhat novel.

Despite this, there is not enough in [i]Old Man's Journey[/i] for me to recommend it.

For a longer review, see the video above or read an extended review at: [url=http://vinrafel.blogspot.com/2017/05/review-old-mans-journey.html]Vinrafel[/url]

Ce jeu est génial! Nous suivons les souvenirs d'un vieillard dans un monde plutôt coloré et très sympathique. L'ambiance, les paysages et les dessins nous plonge directement dans l'histoire. Les puzzles se font facilement, on ne se prend pas la tête avec ça. C'est très plaisant d'avancer avec l'objectif de compléter l'histoire incomplète. 31883345.review:
Développé par Broken Rules, Old Man's Journey est un jeu d'aventure-puzzle qui nous fait vivre le voyage entrepris par un vieil homme suite à la réception d'une lettre. Fini la solitude et bonjour donc l'aventure, armé de son sac à dos et d'une résilience à toute épreuve, notre protagoniste va braver terre et mer pour parvenir au bout de son voyage. N'espérez pas voir de l'action et de la violence, Old Man's Journey est avant tout une belle histoire dans laquelle on va traverser des niveaux superbes tout en débloquant des puzzles simples mais rudement bien pensés. Le long de notre voyage, on découvrira ce qui motive notre personne âgée à entreprendre une telle expédition par le biais de souvenirs et autres anecdotes.

Old Man's Journey est un jeu simple et qui semble directement destiné aux tablettes et autres téléphones portables. En effet, le gameplay est extrêmement simple et intuitif, à l'instar d'un point and click on se déplace dans les niveaux avec un clic et on peut agir sur les éléments du décor comme les montages et autres collines avec la souris avec un doigt sur téléphone. Le but est simple, on doit permettre à notre personnage d'atteindre un certain endroit du niveau afin de débloquer un souvenir ou tout simplement de passer au niveau suivant. Le jeu est constitué de 15 niveaux et peut être terminé en 2 heures chrono. Fort heureusement, Old Man's Journey dispose de très nombreux arguments qui permettent de faire passer la pilule du prix/durée de vie.

Notre pire ennemi, les moutons!
Ce qui frappe en premier lorsque l'on joue au jeu, c'est la beauté des illustrations. Le style graphique est juste fabuleux, les dessins, les animations, tout fonctionne! Le jeu fourmille de petits détails qui sautent aux yeux, on peut s'amuser avec des lignes électriques, s'amuser à déranger un chat ou à chasser les oiseaux des niveaux. C'est bête mais tellement drôle à faire que l'on passe la plupart de son temps à essayer de voir ce qu'il est possible de faire dans les niveaux. Le maniement de notre personnage est aisé même si on a parfois du mal à comprendre quand est-ce que l'on peut passer sur un autre élément du décor et ainsi déplacer les autres. En effet, une fois que l'on se trouve sur un élément du décor, il nous impossible de le faire bouger. Il faudra dès lors bien réfléchir avant de se retrouver bloquer.

La difficulté du jeu est relative, on ne reste jamais bloqué plus de 15 minutes sur un niveau et la réelle difficulté se situe souvent avec les niveaux des moutons. Il faudra gérer le déplacement des moutons sur les montagnes afin de se laisser de la place pour passer. Ce n'est ni compliqué ni difficile mais cela nous obligera à bien réfléchir avant de se déplacer. D'autres scènes nous obligeront à déplacer le décor afin de se frayer un chemin en train ou en camionnette, c'est drôle et très bien pensé. Cela permet des variations de gameplay assez dépaysantes même si le concept ne change que très peu. Si la progression est logique, certains niveaux nous demanderont plus de réflexion et plus d'imagination vers la toute fin du jeu où il faudra trouver une sortie sous-marine. Le jeu est en français dans son interface et peut être joué par un public de 7 à 77 ans.

Un jeu simple mais pas simpliste, loin de là.
Old Man's Journey est magnifique mais il est également doté d'une bande son particulièrement magistrale par l'excellent scntfc à qui l'on devait déjà la bande son de Oxenfree. Je vous invite d'ailleurs à vous la procurer de toute urgence tant elle est excellente. Le jeu est également très bien écrit avec une bien belle histoire tragique qui fera peut-être remonter des souvenirs chez certains au niveau de l'abandon et du désespoir. Notre vieil homme a perdu beaucoup de choses au court de sa vie et il va tout faire pour s'offrir une rédemption à priori impossible. Qu'est ce qui peut motiver un vieux loup de mer à partir comme ca du jour au lendemain? On le découvre au fur et à mesure de notre progression et certains passages feront penser à Up des studios pixar mais avec un impact émotionnel moindre toutefois.

Le jeu est disponible sur PC, App Store et sur Google Play au prix de 7.99€ ce qui peut paraitre un brin cher en considérant le temps effectif de jeu. Pourtant, c'est un faux débat tant le jeu maitrise sa narration et à la vue de l'ingéniosité des scènes. Sous côté simple, Old Man's Journey est une perle d'inventivité et d'ambiance. Tout n'est pas parfait néanmoins, on peut regretter le côté jeu pour tablette sur la version Steam avec l'obligation de fermer le jeu à la sauvage sans pouvoir passer par un bouton prévu à et effet. L'histoire, touchante, reste assez capillotractée sur certains moments et on se doute assez vite du dénouement même si tout est relativement bien amené par le jeu. J'ai passé un très agréable moment sur ce jeu même si j'en espérais un peu plus au niveau des énigmes et de la durée de vie mais il reste un achat intéressant et à bas prix. Sortez vos mouchoirs et vos sacs à dos et partons à l'aventure!

31882193.review:
[h1] 愿你走出半生 仍是少年 有最少的遗憾	[/h1]

最近恰逢毕业季 论文答辩之前购入了这个在愿望清单躺着很久一直在等发售的游戏
没什么特别的原因 就是喜欢这个画风 大概是老了hhh 
论文答辩顺利收尾之后 在今天下午打开游戏 两个小时即可通关（如果不拖沓大概一个半小时可以结束

整个游戏轻微解谜向 通过移动场景 准确的说是道路 来让OLD MAN顺利前进
如何更好地调配各个布景之间的关系 开拓能够前进的小路 在小路的变化中 欣赏到背后隐藏的美景
如何排除障碍 比如说用鼠标赶走挡路的绵羊 用高低坡推动轮子滚动撞开石头墙面

每个部分结束之后会有OLD MAN的一个回忆场景
触发回忆场景的东西 则比较新奇 需要多用鼠标点点来找到
比如 敲响钟楼 点亮路灯 燃起篝火

从配乐和场景的处理上来看 几乎无可挑剔 难以相信是一部独立游戏
[list]
    [*]场景中的很多事物可以用鼠标来互动 虽然无关解谜 但很有趣 比如可以开合的门窗 触碰到之后会左右摇晃的风铃和气球 被惊动了展翅而飞的海鸥
    [*]远景没有简单的贴图而是进行了细致的处理 举一个例子来说 有一个场景是不断前行的火车 随着火车的移动 远景部分也在不断细微地配合变换 让我想起了在西班牙旅行的时候 很多西班牙人相信 最美的西班牙是从马德里到巴塞罗那坐火车时途径的风景 这个游戏的火车移动给我的感受与其类似
    [*]很容易发现 明媚的场景之后是一段愉快的回忆 而阴雨的场景之后是一段悲伤的回忆
    [*]配乐上 虽然是循环往复的调子 但不枯燥乏味 真爱党可以入SOUNDTRACK（囊中羞涩掩面走开
[/list]

虽然给了好评 还是有想吐槽的地方
[list]
    [*]说是轻微解谜 但其实并未有明确的提示 全凭个人的发现和尝试
    [*]剧情上 站在中国人的传统上 其实很难理解 为了梦想和自由放弃家庭这一点吧 而且最后被抛弃的女儿还和他一样喜欢航海 并愉快地生活在了一起 （这种结局 太过英美
    [*]游戏无法存档 必须一次体验结束 没有明确的设置界面
    [*]有个噱头是支持二十七国语言 笑 其实这个游戏 根本没有文字信息和语音 全凭图片互动 和个人想象
[/list]

[spoiler] 之所以写这篇评价 其实是因为 被打动了 OLD MAN在极光漫天当中 手握妻子的照片 我一时有些热泪盈眶 看遍灿烂世界和繁华极光 我发现我还是最爱你 比心作者	[/spoiler]

很遗憾 没有成就没有卡牌 也没有背景 这个画风的游戏 如果有背景 该有多美啊
上面说的这个遗憾被终结了 这个游戏当真完美了 比心

31879321.review:
A wonderful little game. You help the old man on his journey across both gorgeous hand-painted lanscapes and accompany him on his trip down memory lane. It is short, but touching, simple yet satisfying.

This game is for you if you enjoy at least one of the following:
- beautiful music and art
- relateable and emotionally touching stories
- easygoing drag & drop puzzles (by shifting the landscape)
- playing games with non-gamers in your life (children, S.O., parents)

This game might not be for you if you are annoyed by one of the following:
- lack of options / customization in the settings (the devs are working on this though)
- short game time
- easygoing drag & drop puzzles (no harcore brainteasers here)
- characer-driven melodrama

All in all, I think it is well worth to accompany this grandpa on his bittersweet hiking trip. The value proposition works for me, especially knowing how much time and effort went into creating the gorgeus world you traverse.

31865965.review:
[b]一个温暖的午后，在海边独居的老人收到了一封远方的来信
拿到信后，他没有过多的犹豫，就踏上了回忆与美景相伴的旅程
并且为我们带来了一幅：会动、会唱、会讲故事的画卷.......[/b]

[h1]所以说，这不仅仅是一个游戏[/h1]

与其作为游戏，它更像是一幅色粉笔绘制的长篇印象画卷。因为游戏里几乎每一个场景都可以用来截图细细欣赏~极简风格、色粉绘制、还带有印象画派的浪漫。[b]所以有时候，明明知道老人走那边是多走的路，可是我依然会让他走过去，劳驾他老人家给这幅画卷增添一个主体。[/b]而色粉笔因为独特的绘画特征，使得游戏在色彩变化上，变化大，但是变化自然，使得颜色之间近乎完美的衔接，对比强但是没有过分的冲突，使得每个游戏的场景都是一幅幅不可多得的美术佳作，值得欣赏。
[spoiler]还有一个原因是，在下因为某些原因对色粉笔有着很深的执念。虽然不会用色粉笔。但是很喜欢印象派+色粉笔的组合。这也是我星夜兼程玩游戏+写评测的动力[/spoiler]

[h1]构图，绝对没有看上去那么简单[/h1]

游戏的操作极其简单：点击地面让老人走过去，降低或者抬升地面让老人轻松漫过。这就是游戏的操作以及解谜环节。
我还请各位看官在每次解谜之前，和解谜之后进行一次截图，如下图：
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=929478801
你操控老人走过去后，会惊讶的发现，你为了让他走过去而抬升的地面，正好是老人应该走到山顶的镜头画面。而老人一开始的位置所看到的景色正好是半山腰所处位置的景色。真的是，非常！非常巧妙的移步换景！！这里真的是给设计师跪了！！！而且构图也是丝毫没有违和的感觉，正好处在一个非常舒服的位置！！真的是！！！太奇妙了！！！[spoiler]内心充满了波动~[/spoiler]
而这也是，你完全没有看一点游戏文本，但是剧本也出现在你的心里的原因之一。

[h1]没有语言，没有文字，但有时候音乐和画面更有故事[/h1]

游戏从开始到结束，陪伴你的只有舒缓的古典音乐。而且多是令人感到放松的弦乐器演奏的舒缓音乐，在欣赏的时候，配合老人的旅程和回忆，总是让我们遐想万分：他旅行到这里是不是和这个人聊过天？是不是和那个老太太打了招呼？走累了坐下休息时的回忆，也依然在音乐的辅助下变得有滋有味，栩栩如生。而音乐的节奏也与游戏里的季节息息相关的感觉~充满活力的音乐，配上百花盛开的画面。没有人告诉过我这是什么季节，我也感受到了春天的气息。

游戏的画面，也就是老人的旅程还有老人的回忆，是剧情的最直观线索。画面上很多东西是可以进行互动的，某些像我这样的的“好事之徒”就是沉迷互动的典型。借助这些互动要素，你总是可以在心中脑补一个小故事。而这故事是完全属于你的，它既可以幽默，也可以感伤。[b]在游戏的同时发挥着无穷的想象力，是这个游戏最大的乐趣。[/b]而游戏的主线也是没有任何文字的，但并不意味着主线不明确！而结局我觉得大家应该是一样的。而其中的过程，就是你发挥想象力的空间。反正我最后....我感受到的不是悲伤，而是犹如夕阳照在身上的温暖，它不像日出时那样耀眼，不像正午时那样燥热，而是温柔且温暖的夕阳。但这种温暖，也总是转瞬即逝的，游戏的最后也不失补上希望这种芬芳的调味料——老人，青年，婴儿，踏上了旅程。
[b]但愿幸福长存[/b]

[h1]最后我再鸡蛋里挑骨头般的给出几个大部分人觉得是缺点的东西：[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]游戏流程过短。我从开始到通关只用了1.6个小时。[/b]但我认为这个游戏的艺术性和思考性大过它的娱乐性，它是一部你可以1.6小时通关并再去用16年或者更久都不会忘怀的小作品

[*][b]游戏娱乐性不足[/b]:和[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/206440/To_the_Moon/]去月球[/url]一样，你完全可以说它是一个点点点就可以通关的作品。也可以说它和ABZU一样是一个卖画面的作品。但是又如何呢？在看漫画的时候我们会笑，但在看蒙娜丽莎的时候有几个捧腹大笑的呢？[b]这个游戏虽然不能说是游戏里的蒙娜丽莎，但也不至于笑不出来[/b]

[*][b]莫名其妙出现的bug[/b]:在老人上火车那点剧情，我遇到了老人上了火车但是镜头没有随着火车移动的bug。但是又因为背景太好看，音乐太好听。结果我还对着背景发了会呆……才意识到……出bug了

[*][b]没有找到退出游戏按键……[/b]:
在下无能，真没找到

[*][b]游戏结束的后记和职员表是英文的～[/b]
说好的27国语音呢！！！（笑）
[/list]

[b]有时候游戏是博人一乐的
有时候游戏是用来欣赏的
有时候游戏是用来挑战的
有时候游戏是用来思考的[/b]

对于这款游戏，因为某些原因并不想把我理解的剧情在评测里写出来。
希望每个人在玩了这个游戏后，有自己的体会。
而不是争论剧情如何如何
并且，珍惜身边的一切

[h1]在这里感谢这个优秀的作品[/h1]

31857922.review:
《老人之旅》是新出的一款2d解谜游戏，对于这款游戏，我是对它十分看好的
剧情8/10  故事很简单，一个老人独自离开他的家，开始了他的旅行，在沿途他看见了许多事情，不禁让他想起当年的情景，非常清新治愈，虽然没有台词，但是游戏已经通过人物动作将剧情铺张开在你面前
画面9/10  游戏的画面是当时我看见的最大的亮点，手绘的水彩风格的游戏画面，清新简约，不脏不乱，非常讨人喜欢
音乐8/10  游戏的bgm是非常赞的，十分衬托了游戏的风格，一开始的手弹吉他加上手风琴的伴奏让人感觉到一股清新的春风袭面而来，十分放松，好评
游戏性8.5/10  听说这款游戏和当初《纪念碑谷》很相似，开始我玩的时候根本没有感觉到很像，但是到了旅馆那里，玩家需要拉动后面的山坡的高度来使老人到达旅馆，这一瞬间，我感觉到了《纪念碑谷》的气息扑面而来，游戏主要是使用视觉错觉来进行解谜，趣味性大大提升，游戏里很多物品可以互动，这点好评
总评：8.5/10  佳作  堪称2d的纪念碑谷，画面和音乐剧情做得都非常不错，解谜部分也很有趣，使人玩得停不下来，看ui的样子游戏应该有手机平板版，喜好解谜游戏的同学可以试试，31元完全不亏

This game is awesome, this is the simple review, if you want a reason as to why buy this game?
It's a simple reason, it's refreshing.

Now the "not so simple review"

Pros:
-Awesome Art Style
-Interesting Storyline
-Sound design on Point
-Puzzles

Cons:
-Short story
-Easy Puzzles
-That Ending (Not really a con but i will ist it, if you played it, you will know why)

So, the game starts out strong, it doesn't explain anything about itself with words per-se, you will live and recreate the experiences our old fella' had. You will unfold the story as you progress trough the game and you will fucking enjoy it. The ambient music goes really well with the development of the story. I personally enjoyed it, it is a well structured story for this kind of game, but man, did i wish this was longer than just a few hours. (Can be beaten under an hour), the puzzles are not that easy the first time you encounter them, and since the game tells you nothing on how to proceed you will always have to use your brain to keep the game going, but not even then, are they that hard.

I loved the game, it is a nice story for people with families living far away. Enjoy the game and peace!

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/fenxer/recommended/581270/]fenx君的评测[/url]比较有用。

没兴趣导购，随便用小学生语文聊聊。

画面的方面芬芬总结过了，我也不赘述了 。真的很牛逼，单凭这个可以买这部作品。

然后，
我个人觉得老人之旅有两个问题：（我个人觉得这五个字的意思是明显不是对的，谢谢）
1：用冒险去”终结“冒险。我想看的是类似UP的东西，而不是主角在年轻任性之后需要反悔自己没有承担足够的社会责任的问题。社会责任本来就和幻想中的冒险冲突，更显得矛盾的是作者给出的出路是老婆死了之后大家继续开心的去进行老婆一直不同意的冒险。其实这从一个侧面也可以看出好莱坞电影在动机构造方面的高明之处。既然是梦想的传承，那么死的人也应该带着梦想而死。

其实说白了，整个游戏的解密流程都是基于对一张图几个层级的修改而构成的。这从一开始就让这个游戏顺着近年来什么，感动自己，虽然没有一丁点游戏性但是讲了很多东西的艺术流游戏大道走了下去。但问题是，你讲的不是一个大家能直接感受到的东西。再看看其他一些游戏，比如被某位真的很厉害的好友（我真的没有恶意，请大佬真的别删我（））炮轰的ABZU。相对而言我觉得他还不错，因为他在叙述内容上，是先从最基础的探索这个正常人类所爱的东西往上走，再去讲那些和我们并不切身相关的事情。冒险，探索，寻求新鲜的东西本来就是人之常情。若是上来就打一巴掌，就会把整个游戏的内容拍平。所以我也不太同意@陆仁钾 钾哥说这游戏和Firewatch像。看火故事的缘起是人生的意外而不是有意为之的破坏，至于内容就不说了。

2：BUG，BUG，我截图游戏经常崩溃，整个游戏流程2h我大概崩了4 5 回。不过这个还是能修复的。

总的来说画面打8分，内容扣1分，还是能给到7分左右。如果对游戏性有要求基本可以不用考虑，对画面风格有兴趣可以买来学习。对叙述内容有要求左转edith finch，类似东西，画面还好看。对大叔有要求建议左转[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/447190/Pub_Encounter/]Pub Encounter[/url]

没有过高要求，那就请享受老人在你面前的最后一次冒险吧。

31839328.review:
Old Man's Journey - це не просто піша прогулянка старого чоловіка, це подорож спогадами, емоціями та докорами сумління.

Скажу чесно я під враженням від гри, не тому що це іновативна гра, але як готовий продукт це фантастична гра.

По перше це візуально, гра несамовито гарна, кожна локація вручну промальована в стилістиках (регіональних) які, як мені здалося легко впізнати, пиємні пастельні кольори і цікаві графічні ефекти створюють атмосферу котра мені чомусь нагадала картини Моне.
В грі буде момент коли герой сяде під світлом ліхтаря, і ефект світла був просто памятним.

Далі музика, вона чудова, ідеально вписується під кожну локацію, приємна, мелодійна навіть чутлива. Музика в грі дуже класно доповнює те що ми бачимо, тому зануритись в гру буде дуже легко.

Сама гра це point & click з головоломками, доволі простими, але цікавою механікою зміни ландшафту довкола героя, це одне з тих місць де казуальність мобільних пристроїв проявляється.

І сюжет котрий в грі подається без жодного тексту, при цьому залишаючись зрозумілим. В ньому немає нічого неймовірного, скоріше навіть - просто життєва історія, але це його перевага, як на мене.

Хоча є в гри серйозні мінуси, як для ПК версії. Для початку це з гри не можна вийти, немає такого функціоналу в меню, та і меню як такого немає, мобільність гри в цьому просто ріже очі, хоча самий простий спосіб уникнути цього - купити гру на мобільних пристроях, одного з сторів

Тривалість гри відносно ціни можливо і недостатня, але враження вона дорує вартісні. Тому безсумнівно раджу гру, тут чи на мобільних неважливо, просто дана гра вартує щоб її зіграли!

通关来评，轻度剧透。
花了将近一半的时间在听音乐，确实很美，尤其从坐着小船到达港口之后，音乐悲伤起来，很符合剧情的发展。个人认为最美的两段音乐是前几关的小火车和倒数第二关的小汽车，前者是对团聚的渴望和期盼，比较悠扬，还带着小雀跃；后者是即将团聚时的紧张，激动，和一丝怯意。
剧情很简单，年轻的时候放荡不羁爱自由，激情澎湃，老来独身一人孤独寂寞才想起家的好。人一辈子吧，结完婚生完孩子，仿佛就没有了生活的目标和追求，想要用追求刺激和体验快感去替代平静平凡的生活，殊不知平凡的生活也是一种挑战，激情可以和平静共存。

31834824.review:
[code]图文版详细查看[url=https://cowlevel.net/game/Old_Man_s_Journey/review/2394272]奶牛关[/url]。[/code]

是什么，可以让一位六十八岁的年迈老人不辞辛劳、跋山涉水再次义无反顾地踏上旅行？

起始画面的镜头右转，故事的帷幕马上拉开，大概一场电影的时间，建议腾出2小时左右空闲时间一口气看到结局以达到最佳沉浸效果。

游戏的玩法我想不到除了钢笔锚点工具所操控的贝塞尔曲线之外还与其他的相似机制，甚至游戏内的鼠标都具有相似的形状——

（假装有图）

游戏中的很多布景板的边缘都是可以移动的，正如操控锚点一样。边缘相交成点，搭建老人前进的道路便是游戏玩法的目的所在。于此看来其实游戏的原型搭建比较简单，把图层分为边缘可变与边缘固定两种类型，搭配以一些特殊规则（游戏中很容易获取到）和适可而止的增量，整体来说还算精巧。

（假装有图）

但这也只是创新的根基，游戏最牛逼的地方在于，无论玩家如何操控曲线，这种以手绘材质搭建的布景结合从整体上看总是没有违和感。一块布景高则山峦低则平原，还要配合玩家达成不可逆的解谜，这势必要经过无数次的修正才可以得出现在的最优解。但这里还不是游戏的全部，如此华丽的视觉还需佐上乡村风味十足的音乐，并以灵动的装饰元素作为甜品，才使得玩家可以享受到一段往事的咀嚼。

实际上 ，游戏的视觉深度也止于此。在电影中，物体与光影所形成的轮廓线是表达主题的重要元素之一。而在这次旅行中，轮廓线会经玩家之手屡次改变，大众的场面调度能力都是为解决谜题而生，所以在这方面游戏失去了一项表达手法，但绝不能说是缺点，只能说遗憾。

在每一次解决谜题后，老人会找个地方歇脚，睹物思人，开始回忆自己年轻的时光，游戏的信息量也大致集中在这里。故事很明了，也印证了游戏的标题Old Man's Journey——成也『Journey』，败也『Journey』。

仁者乐山，智者乐水。不仅仅是回忆，感觉可以从旅行的过程中看到更多……


相关阅读：
Clemens Scott的GDC演讲，讲述了游戏开发时美术风格的探索以及游戏的一些机制和目标等。他的推特是
 https://twitter.com/Rostiger。
另外一位美术小哥Lip Comarella是 https://twitter.com/LipComarella ，可以看出Old Man's Journey的风格正是他擅长的方向。
